City of La Villa - Online Job Application

### City of La Villa - Online Job Application

Answer all questions. Only fully completed applications will be considered for employment. The information you supply will be fully verified, so you should avoid any misstatements since they would jeopardize your consideration for employment or serve as grounds for dismissal if hired.

Which position are you applying for?
\*

Select PositionMaintenance Worker

Job Description

<hr /><p><b>Applicant must have experience in local government, strong background in business and public administration, financial skills, strong planning skills, be customer oriented, experience in community development, able to manage department heads, strong oral and written communication skills and must possess good character and integrity. If you feel you meet the qualifications for this position, you can apply via this form or in person at La Villa City Hall located at 916 S. Mike Chapa, La Villa, Texas between the hours of 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m., Monday through Friday. Salary commensurate with experience. </b></p>

<h2 style="text-align: center;">AUTHORIZATION AND AGREEMENT</h2>
<p style="text-align: center;"><em>Please read carefully before signing. If you have any questions, please call City Hall at (956) 262-2122.</em></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">The City of La Villa is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate in its recruiting, selection, and hiring procedures because of race, color, sex, religion, national origin, age, disability, citizenship, veteran status, political affiliation or belief, or any other non-job related factor.</p>
I authorize the references and prior employers listed in this Application for Employment to give the City of La Villa any pertinent information they may have, personal or otherwise, and release all parties from all liability for any damage that may result from furnishing same to the City of La Villa.
I hereby affirm that the information provided in this Application for Employment is true, correct, and complete. if employed, any misstatements or omission of fact on this application may result in my dismissal.
I understand that completion of this application form does not constitute any type of employment agreement or contract. I further understand that acceptance of an offer of employment does not create a contractual obligation upon the employer to continue to employ me in the future. (Social Security and Driver License number, home address and date of birth may be requested as a condition for employment at time of job offer).
